content: I don't have personal experiences, but i can provide you with some information about the night tours of alcatraz island. the night tours of alcatraz island are indeed popular because they offer a spooky and eerie atmosphere, perfect for those looking to experience the island's haunted past. the night tours include a guided walk through the cellblocks, a talk about the island's history, and stories about the strange occurrences that have been reported on the island over the years. the night tours also offer a unique view of san francisco bay and the city lights, especially from the partially lit alcatraz island. however, these tours tend to sell out quickly, so be sure to book your tickets in advance.
